aws::graph::propositions: # Amazon 10-K Filing Factors Affecting Business Operations
service, and product line expansions affect Amazon's operations.
the extent to which Amazon finances its current operations affects its business.
the terms of any financing for Amazon's current operations affects its business.
the terms of any financing for Amazon's future growth affects its business.
the outcomes of legal proceedings can have a material adverse impact on Amazon's operating results.
the outcomes of claims can include significant monetary damages.
the outcomes of claims can include injunctive relief.
the outcomes of claims can have a material adverse impact on Amazon's operating results.
variations in the mix of products Amazon sells affects its business.
variations in the mix of services Amazon sells affects its business.
variations in Amazon's level of merchandise returns affects its business.
variations in Amazon's level of vendor returns affects its business.
the extent to which Amazon offers fast delivery affects its business.
the extent to which Amazon offers free delivery affects its business.
the extent to which Amazon continues to reduce prices worldwide affects its business.
the extent to which Amazon provides additional benefits to its customers affects its business.
factors affecting Amazon's reputation affect its business.
factors affecting Amazon's brand image affect its business.
any actual inability to achieve Amazon's goals affects its reputation.
any perceived inability to achieve Amazon's goals affects its reputation.
Amazon's goals may be related to sustainability.
Amazon's goals may be related to customers.
Amazon's goals may be related to employees.
Amazon's goals may be related to other topics.
public perceptions regarding Amazon's positions on social issues affect its business.
public perceptions regarding Amazon's positions on ethical issues affect its business.
public perceptions regarding Amazon's development of artificial intelligence technologies affect its business.
public perceptions regarding Amazon's use of artificial intelligence technologies affect its business.
public perceptions regarding Amazon's development of machine learning technologies affect its business.
public perceptions regarding Amazon's use of machine learning technologies affect its business.
public perceptions regarding Amazon's development of automation technologies affect its business.
public perceptions regarding Amazon's use of automation technologies affect its business.
public perceptions regarding Amazon's automation products affect its business.
public perceptions regarding Amazon's automation services affect its business.
the extent to which Amazon invests in technology affects its business.
the extent to which Amazon invests in infrastructure affects its business.
